Mini Pancakes.name: Pistachio Mini Pancake
Mini Pancakes.description: Miniature pancakes infused with the delightful flavor of pistachios.

Mojitos.name: Passion Fruit Mojito
Mojitos.description: Made with passion fruit, lime, mint and a splash of soda water and will transport you to a tropical paradise.

Fresh Juices.name: Orange Fresh Juice
Fresh Juices.description: Awaken your senses with our handcrafted Orange Fresh Juice, expertly squeezed from plump, delivering vibrant citrus flavors and revitalizing goodness in every sip.

Iced Coffee.name: Iced Americano
Iced Coffee.description: Made with dark espresso and ice. it's the perfect way to cool down and refresh yourself during the hot summer days, or any time you crave a refreshing coffee.

Iced Coffee.name: Iced Latte
Iced Coffee.description: Made with rich espresso, milk, and ice, it's the perfect way to cool down and refresh yourself during the hot summer days, or any time you crave a refreshing coffee.

Iced Coffee.name: Iced Spanish Latte
Iced Coffee.description: Made with rich espresso, milk and ice, the perfect drink for those hot summer days

Iced Coffee.name: Iced Caramel Latte
Iced Coffee.description: Savor the irresistible allure of our Iced Caramel Latte, a refreshing blend of rich espresso, creamy milk, and a luscious caramel syrup, creating a delectable coffee beverage that tantalizes your taste buds with every sip.

Hot Coffee.name: Espresso Single
Hot Coffee.description: A bold and intense flavor of our freshly brewed espresso.

Hot Coffee.name: Espresso Double
Hot Coffee.description: Indulge in the rich and invigorating experience of our Espresso Double, a harmonious blend of two shots of robust espresso, delivering a bold caffeine kick that will awaken your senses and leave you craving for more.

Hot Coffee.name: Flat White
Hot Coffee.description: Made with a double shot of espresso and steamed milk, it's a perfect balance of strength and creaminess that will keep you going throughout the day.

Hot Coffee.name: Cappuccino
Hot Coffee.description: Made with espresso and steamed milk creating rich, velvety taste.

Hot Coffee.name: Latte
Hot Coffee.description: Made with espresso and steamed milk, it's the perfect way to start your day or take a break during the day.

Hot Coffee.name: Spanish Latte
Hot Coffee.description: Made with espresso, steamed milk, and a touch of cinnamon, it's a perfect blend of flavors that will satisfy your sweet tooth and pick you up any time of the day.

Hot Coffee.name: Turkish Coffee
Hot Coffee.description: Experience the rich, bold flavor of authentic Turkish coffee with our premium blend made from the finest hand-picked Arabica beans.

Hot Coffee.name: French Coffee
Hot Coffee.description: Experience the rich and bold flavor for those who appreciate a strong and robust taste.

Hot Coffee.name: Green Tea
Hot Coffee.description: Savor the delicate aroma and taste of our premium green tea, expertly harvested and processed to preserve their natural antioxidants and health benefits.

Hot Coffee.name: Black Tea
Hot Coffee.description: Savor the rich aroma and taste of our premium tea, expertly blended to create a perfect tea drinking experience.

Sauces.name: Tahina Sauce
Sauces.description: A creamy and nutty condiment made from ground sesame seeds, perfect for adding a rich flavor to various dishes.

Sauces.name: Cheddar Sauce
Sauces.description: Creamy Cheddar Sauce, Made with sharp cheddar cheese.

Sauces.name: Hot Sauce
Sauces.description: Spice up your meals with our fiery Hot Sauce, a bold blend of spices and peppers that adds an irresistible kick to every bite, leaving you craving more.

Sauces.name: Honey Mustard Sauce
Sauces.description: A perfect dip to experience a perfect balance of sweet and tangy flavors that will leave your taste buds begging for more!

Soft Drinks and Water.name: RedBull
Soft Drinks and Water.description: Made with a blend of caffeine, taurine, and b-group vitamins

Soft Drinks and Water.name: Red Fanta
Soft Drinks and Water.description: Carbonated soft drink with a red color.

General_review: Loqmat Al Afya is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Fast Food, Sandwiches, Burgers that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are MEAL TORTILLA SUPER, MEAL TORTILLA, SIKH KABAB and MEAL CRISPY, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Fast Food, Sandwiches, Burgers.
They have been reviewed 17085 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

extra_details.title: 12 By The Gathering Bistro X Mubkhar

General_review: The Gathering Bistro is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Breakfast, Pasta, Italian that delivers across Abu Halifa, Abu Halifa, Ardiya Small Industrial, Hawally and Qibla.

Their best selling dishes are Bistro's Club Sandwich, Orange Juice, Egg Pancake Tacos and Classic Eggs Benedict, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Breakfast, Pasta, Italian.
They have been reviewed 21124 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

General_review: Kalha is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Breakfast, Arabic, Falafel that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Airport, Ali Sabah Al-Salem - Umm Al Hayman, Doha and Ghornata.

Their best selling dishes are Super sandwiches meal box, (12) Pieces Falafel, Flafel with Potato super and Zahara Moshakil - Ma'aoon, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Breakfast, Arabic, Falafel.
They have been reviewed 61022 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

Customer_reviews.review_comment: we had asked for more tahina and also add spicy sauce which was not added on time

General_review: The Kind Ones is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Breakfast, Sandwiches, American that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.

Their best selling dishes are Hash Brown, Halloumi Sandwich, Soft Scramble Sandwich and Orange Juice, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Breakfast, Sandwiches, American.
They have been reviewed 35852 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

info.Address: in West Abu Fetera Small Indust, Kuwait

General_review: Simsim is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Pastries, Bakery, Breakfast that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa, Abu Hasaniya and Al Masayel.

Their best selling dishes are Simsim Select 12 Pide, Simsim Minis Signature, Zaa'tar Safeha and Simsim Select 12 Safeha, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Pastries, Bakery, Breakfast.
They have been reviewed 31480 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: OPT Coffee is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Coffee, Bakery, Desserts that delivers across Al-Bedae, Ardhiya, Ardhiya 4, Kuwait City and Mahboula.
Their best selling dishes are Ice Spanish, Nutella Heaven, Club Sandwich and Pesto hallomi burger, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Coffee, Bakery, Desserts.
They have been reviewed 13697 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Hamsat Kuwaitia is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Kuwaiti, Breakfast, Grills that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Halifa, Abu Hasaniya and Adailiya.

Their best selling dishes are Shakshoka, Hamsa Eggplant Potato, White Cheese Plate and Hamsa Kuwaiti Chicken Kuwaiti Hamsat, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Kuwaiti, Breakfast, Grills.

General_review: Rochas sweets is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Desserts, Pastries, Cakes that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are Dolce Sweet, Snak, Fabio Sweet and Trafel Kandar , although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Desserts, Pastries, Cakes.
They have been reviewed 14290 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Health Stop is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Healthy, Burgers, Breakfast that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are Healthy Fries and Egg Mortadella Wrap, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Healthy, Burgers, Breakfast.
They have been reviewed 66044 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Diet Care is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Healthy, Sandwiches, Organic that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Halifa, Airport and Al-Ahmadi.

Their best selling dishes are Thin Crust Pizza Margarita, Tandoori Chicken, Mini Halloumi Tortillas with Labneh and Mixed Cheese Croissant, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Healthy, Sandwiches, Organic.
They have been reviewed 11336 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

Dessert.name: Cookies
Dessert.description: Experience our soft and chewy cookies are the perfect combination of sweet and satisfying, with a variety of mouthwatering flavors to choose from that will leave you craving for more.

Dessert.name: Carrot Cake
Dessert.description: Made with fresh picked carrots, moist layers of carrot cake, infused with aromatic spices, topped with a tangy cream cheese frosting

Dessert.name: Brownies
Dessert.description: Indulge in the richness of our fudgy Brownies, made with chocolate and butter for intense flavor and finished with a crackly top for ultimate indulgence.

Drinks.name: Lemon And Mint Juice
Drinks.description: A zingy blend of freshly squeezed lemons and fragrant mint leaves, perfectly balanced to awaken your senses and invigorate your taste buds!

Drinks.name: Orange Juice
Drinks.description: Made capturing all the natural sweetness and tangy citrus flavor. Packed with Vitamin C, it's the perfect thirst quencher and a healthy addition to your daily diet.

Drinks.name: Pineapple Juice
Drinks.description: A sweet, tropical drink made by blending the flesh of a pineapple. It is a rich source of vitamin C and contains enzymes that can aid digestion.

Drinks.name: Kiwi Juice
Drinks.description: Made from freshly squeezed kiwis, it's packed with natural sweetness, vitamins and minerals, making it a healthy and delicious drink option.

Drinks.name: Mojito
Drinks.description: Made with lime, mint and a splash of soda water and will transport you to a tropical paradise.

Add on.name: Extra Mushroom
Add on.description: Enhance the earthy flavor of your dish with our deliciously juicy and savory extra mushrooms!

Add on.name: Extra Cheese
Add on.description: Upgrade your dish with Extra Cheese, adding a rich and gooey layer of indulgence to satisfy your cheesy cravings.

General_review: Zero Carb is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Healthy, Breakfast, Italian that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.

Their best selling dishes are Pepperoni Pizza, Fettuccini Alfredo, Commando Fries and Diet Butter Chicken, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Healthy, Breakfast, Italian.
They have been reviewed 39051 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

Their best selling dishes are Classic Falafel Sandwich, 6 O'clock Sandwich, Karak and Wake Up Sandwich, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Breakfast, Coffee, Sandwiches.
They have been reviewed 4063 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

Customer_reviews.review_comment: Delicious!! fresh a must try, definitely ordering again. 100+ fast delivery, very courteous found my place quickly. thanks you

General_review: Koobs is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Coffee, Cafe, Desserts that delivers across Abu Halifa, Al-Bedae, Ardhiya, Bayan and Egaila.
Their best selling dishes are Black Spanish , Iced Spanish Latte , Smoked Turkey Toast and ICED | Matcha, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Coffee, Cafe, Desserts.
They have been reviewed 18908 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: EAST is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Healthy, Sandwiches, Coffee that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.
Their best selling dishes are Halloumi Saj, Orange Juice, Chips N Dips Small and Hash Browns, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Healthy, Sandwiches, Coffee.
They have been reviewed 38841 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Wadi Al Ghoroub is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Breakfast, Arabic, Falafel that delivers across Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa, Adailiya and Al-Ahmadi.

Their best selling dishes are Super Mix Sandwich, Hummus Platter, Falafel Super Sandwich and Mutabal Platter, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Breakfast, Arabic, Falafel.
They have been reviewed 31921 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Fatayer Station is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Pies, Bakery, Sandwiches that delivers across Abdullah Al-Mubarak - West Jeleeb, Abdullah Al-Salem, Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa and Abu Hasaniya.

Their best selling dishes are Fatayer Station Stars, French Fries, Akkawi Pie and Gathering Box Number 1 Mini Fatayer 24 Pieces, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Pies, Bakery, Sandwiches.
They have been reviewed 5026 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.

General_review: Fatayer Levo is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Breakfast, Pastries & Sweets, Desserts that delivers across Ali Sabah Al-Salem - Umm Al Hayman, Jahra - Al Naeem , Jahra - Amgarah Industrial, Jahra - Jahra Area and Jahra - Kabd.

Their best selling dishes are Kraft Pie With Hot Dog, Whole Halloumi Pie, Kraft Cheese Feteer Meshaltet and Akkawi Cheese Feteer Meshaltet, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Breakfast, Pastries & Sweets, Desserts.
They have been reviewed 10744 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

Their best selling dishes are 10 Plain Chapati, Cheese Samosa 10 Pieces, Chapati Halloumi Cheese Full and Chapati Kiri Cheese, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Breakfast, Coffee, Tea.
They have been reviewed 19296 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.

General_review: Fatayer Al Raha is a restaurant located in Kuwait, serving a selection of Pies, Breakfast, Pastries that delivers across Abu Ftaira, Abu Halifa, Abu Hasaniya, Adan and Al Masayel.
Their best selling dishes are Beef Pie, Raha Special Safiha, Halloumi Cheese Pie and French Fries, although they have a variety of dishes and meals to choose from like Pies, Breakfast, Pastries.
They have been reviewed 4900 times by talabat users, with a rating of 4.5.
